name: Square League: Brawl
description:
CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS TO EPIC SQUARE LEAGUE: BRAWL MATCH!

Play with up two four players around the same keyboard and experience the old school party gaming all over again. Ditch your controllers and squeeze around the same keyboard for some serious brawling!

Rotate your ship, use down key to charge a shot and up key for full throttle for your square rocket!

  • Developed by Klaus Kääriäinen: Jestercraft
  • Homepage: https://jestercraft.com/
  • Discord channel: https://discord.gg/hdZXeMJ

Taking part to #Jesterjam 3 game jam: https://itch.io/jam/jesterjam-3

Thank you Maarit for creating the background image, collectable object and platform graphics for the game! <3
